game.description: The village of Brindlemark is plagued by a series of mysterious disappearances. The villagers believe that the missing people have been taken by a group of goblins that have made their lair in the nearby caves.
game.objective: Investigate the disappearance of several villagers and put an end to the goblin threat.
game.reward: A small chest containing 100 gold pieces and a magical potion that grants the drinker temporary resistance to fire damage.

tasks.description: Talk to the villagers and gather information about the disappearances.
tasks.objective: Gather information about the missing people and their last known whereabouts.

tasks.description: Explore the nearby caves and investigate any signs of goblin activity.
tasks.objective: Find evidence of the goblins' lair and determine their numbers.

tasks.description: Track down and defeat the leader of the goblin group.
tasks.location: The heart of the goblin lair
tasks.objective: Put an end to the goblin threat and free any remaining captives.

game.title: The Disappearance of the Villagers
